snippet: The president said that it had been made clear to ISIS that the United States would not back down and in the end, “we will get you.”
abstract: President Obama, visiting New Jersey military base, says United States and its allies have progressed in slowing advance of Islamic extremists in Iraq and Syria; thanks troops for their service.
lead_paragraph: The president said that it had been made clear to ISIS that the United States would not back down and in the end, “we will get you.”

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
